page.title: 09St.Mary's Church.continued.
page.content: Under the floor of the church there is the body of a man in a tomb. His name was Francis Button and he died on July 16th,1830. There is a very old organ in the church.It can be worked by pumping in air with a wooden hand pump.In the past when people pumped the organ, they used to carve their names in the wood at the side of the organ.There is a scroll on the wall. It looks as though it is made of paper but in fact it is made of marble.There is a big bowl that looks like a barbeque.It was once used to keep the church warm,by burning charcoal in it. There is also an old oak trunk holding the churches secrets. It is bolted heavily. We think that St.Mary's church is a useful guide to things from the past. By Lauren Tompkins.
